item.title: 树莓派使用手册
item.author: 作者
item.description: 安装mysql8 1 2 3 4 5 sudo apt install mariadb-server sudo mysql UPDATE user SET password = password('xxxx') WHERE user = 'root'; UPDATE user SET plugin = 'mysql_native_password' WHERE user = 'root'; flush privileges; 设置root远程访问 1 2 3 vi /etc/mysql/mariadb.conf.d/50-server.cnf # 注释 port bind-address sudo systemctl restart mariadb 设置账号权限 1 2 3 4 # 重新进入 mysql -u root -p use mysql; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.
